memberdef.name: IMGUI_DEMO_MARKER
memberdef.initializer: do { if (GImGuiDemoMarkerCallback != NULL) GImGuiDemoMarkerCallback(__FILE__, __LINE__, section, GImGuiDemoMarkerCallbackUserData); } while (0)

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* ImGuiDemoMarkerCallback) (const char *file, int line, const char *section, void *user_data)
memberdef.argsstring: )(const char *file, int line, const char *section, void *user_data)
memberdef.name: ImGuiDemoMarkerCallback

inbodydescription.para: of the loop. May be a pointer to your own node type, etc.
